questions.title: Temperature Converter
questions.question: Convert temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit and Kelvin
questions.description:
Double Celsius = 100
Double Fahrenheit = Celsius*(9/5)+32
Double Kelvin = Celsius + 273.15
Sout (“Celcius = ” + Celcius)
Sout (“Fahrenheit = “ + Fahrenheit)
Sout (“Kelvin = “ + Kelvin)

questions.title: Check Similar Number
questions.question: Check if the number is similar or not
questions.description:
Int no1 = 16
Int no2 = 33
If (no1 == no2)
Sout (“numbers are similar”)
Else
Sout (“numbers are different”)

questions.title: Sum All Digits of an Integer
questions.question: Sum the digits of an integer
questions.description:
Int x = 123456
Int y = 0
While (x>0)
Y = y+x%10
X = x/10
Sout (“sum all digits = ” + y)
